synopsis.text: Tsukino Talent Production's bands are geared up for another electrifying season in TSUKIPRO the Animation! Whether you're a rock enthusiast, an EDM fan, or a pop devotee, there's a band to captivate you under the TSUKIPRO banner. Follow the members of SolidS, QUELL, SOARA, and Growth as they strengthen their bonds as bandmates, navigate the tumultuous world of idol fame, and bring their music to the masses with flair! With the Tsukino Talent Productions' Live 2021 Summer Carnival on the horizon, the four units are gearing up for a two-day event that will culminate in a joint live performance. To accommodate the grandeur and layout of the stage, each band must craft new songs and choreographies, adding an extra layer of excitement to the thrilling second season of Tsukipro The Animation. Will they be able to captivate their audience once again? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
